name: bapsicle
description: BAPS3, the third generation of University Radio York's Broadcast and Presenting Suite. This package includes the Server (BAPSicle) and Presenter (WebStudio)

scripts.presenter-install: cd presenter && git submodule update --init && yarn --network-timeout 100000
scripts.presenter-make: npm run presenter-install && (rm -r presenter-build || true) && cd presenter && yarn build-baps && cp -r build ../presenter-build && cd ../ && npm install

author: University Radio York
